entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Hot Springs, central Big Horn and central Washakie Counties through 230 AM MDT... At 144 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crooked Creek Natural Area to 16 miles east of Hot Springs State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph.
